How Do I Become a Top 1% Model on OnlyFans?

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 23 sec

With the top 0.1% of OnlyFans models earning over $1,000,000 monthly, it’s easy to see why so many models are going online to start their modeling careers. Even though the industry is booming, some roadblocks still stand in the way of making it big as a model

If you want to be a top 1% model on OnlyFans, you need to be able to do more than take pictures and post them on social media. To become a top 1% model, you’ll need to work hard and dedicate time to learning new skills and building your brand.

If you’re interested in becoming a top model and earning your own million-dollar paycheck, read on for our guide on becoming a top 1% model!

Make an appointment now

What It Means to Be in the Top Percent on OnlyFans

A top 1% model on OnlyFans is not just a pretty face. It’s about being strategic and having the ability to do extraordinary things. You have a great incentive to climb on the rankings considering the top 0.1 % of creators earn up to $20 million. The top 5% of OnlyFans make a steady income worth $5000-$50,000 monthly.

With collective management experience of over 150 years and millions of dollars in sales to models, we know the workings of the market.

 Fandafia is committed to helping our models achieve unparalleled success.

The OnlyFans Percentage Affects Your Earnings

Your OnlyFans percentage affects your earnings significantly. While the difference between the top 0.1 % and 2 % can be substantial, the higher you rank, the higher you earn. With a good OnlyFans agency by your side, you can bump up the ranking with tested strategies and brand management.

Besides your rankings, the rate per subscription, private video lives, and private messages can also increase your earnings. You need an experienced partner like Fandafia to work with you to optimize your earnings and boost your business.

How the OnlyFans Percentage Is Calculated

While it’s hard to accurately determine the objective criteria used to arrive at the %, some factors affect the percentage. OnlyFans’ Terms of Service don’t explicitly elaborate on the rating calculation.

OnlyFans % is a figure that pops up on your statement as a creator. You will get a text reading, “You are in the top Z% of all creators!”. The ranking is private, and only the account holder can access it. 

More creators are plastering their percentage on social media as a promotional tool. The rankings are probably expressed as percentages to encourage creators. With over 500,000 creators, it would be discouraging to get ‘435,123 out of all creators. The top 5% is more elite and compassionate and boosts competitiveness.

The factors affecting your OnlyFans ranking include;

  • Your earnings. OnlyFans uses a unique algorithm to analyze your earnings against other creators, thus telling you where you lie on the rankings.
  • Levels of engagement relative to the comments you get, likes on posts, and DMs in your inbox.
  • The quality of your photos, videos, and content, where the more professional the content you post, the more opportunities you will see on the platform.
  • Your social media presence and followership levels, whereby the more fans you have, the more you scale the rankings.

What to do to Become top 1% Model on OnlyFans- 15 Tips for Ranking Highly on OnlyFans

1. Treat OnlyFans as a Business

You’ll be a business owner since OnlyFans is a business. You need to be serious about your modeling career and put in the work required to succeed. You’ll also communicate with other models and learn from them.

That means you must treat your brand as a business and act like a business owner. You need to know how to market yourself, making it easier for you to get noticed by potential clients and bring in big money. You can publish an Amazon wishlist of your work and link it back to your website. This will help people see what you can do and want to engage with your page.

2. Use the Percentage as a Motivation Tool

The ranking motivates most creators by allowing them to be more competitive. The steady rise in the rankings also offers real-time feedback on the work you are putting in. You can use the percentage as a motivational tool where you set it as a goal.

You can also use the steady rise up the rankings to pause, congratulate yourself, or take a breather. This is more crucial when you get the creators’ block. Even minus the financial incentive, the % is a great goal to aspire towards.

You need to be measured when evaluating your ranking. Don’t obsess over it, as it can lead to stress and anxiety. Focus on the quality of your content, celebrate all small wins, and patiently work your way to the top.

3. Know Your Market

To become a top 1% model, you need to know your target audience and what they want. You need to understand what makes them tick and the best way to give them what they want. Knowing your market can quickly build a brand that caters to their needs and makes you more attractive to your fans. 

You must understand your ideal client and what they want in an OnlyFans model. This will help give you ideas on how to use your skills to create a brand and offerings that appeal to this group of people.

4. Develop a Unique Style and Fashion Sense

The best way to do this is by researching trends and styles from other top 1% models who have already made it big in their field. Look at them closely, and study their mannerisms, clothing choices, makeup looks, and more- these are all things you can incorporate into your style!

Your style includes dressing the part, from your hair and makeup to the clothes you wear on set. You want to look like an experienced model who knows how to work the camera and make an impression.

5. Create a Unique Brand

The first step in becoming a top 1% OnlyFans model is to create an attractive brand for yourself. When potential clients see your unique style, beauty, and sexiness, they’ll want to know more about you and your services. They will be more inclined to become your fans, subscribe to your channel, and make more purchases. Building loyalty amongst your followers is one of the most important things as an OnlyFans model to keep them coming back for more from you!

The uniqueness of your brand determines the engagements, following, and subscriptions you get on OnlyFans. Fans want to interact with a friendly, sexy, and classy model. A 1% OnlyFans model has a memorable brand that draws the top cream of fans, which pay better for private live videos and pictures. With more than 50 million users, there’s a market waiting for you. This requires a brand that optimizes quality, originality, and trends and meets users’ needs.

6. Build a Robust Portfolio of Sexy Photos and Content 

With so many models on the market today, it’s difficult for anyone to stand out from the crowd. To become a top 1% OnlyFans sexy model, you must have the right portfolio. You need a collection of sexy photos and videos that stand out from the crowd. First of all, make sure your pictures and videos are high-quality. Make sure they look great in black and white or sepia tones.

As an exclusive market for exclusive content, you need a rich portfolio to cut the mark. You can lock your content behind a paywall, where fans can access the content for premium prices. You have complete control over the content you post and share on the platform, depending on your target market. Due to the limited restrictions, you have the flexibility to use anything from adult material to classy pictures or live reels.

7. Be Creative and Proactive

As a model, you must stay creative and proactive. You must stay on top of things and be willing to try new things. It’s not always easy to come up with an idea, but if you do, it will pay off in the end.

As a platform for premium and valuable content, OnlyFans has over 1 million creators, indicating high competition. Using proactive and creative strategies, you need to be creative and use all the features to increase your earnings, loyal following, and profile. 

You can leverage paid tips and private messages to boost your earnings, thus improving your rankings in the process. You can also take advantage of the OnlyFans referrals program to get 5% off every referral. Another strategy involves leveraging the emerging trend of subscription-based social media. Users will subscribe to your channel and pay for your exclusive and unique content.

You will get expert support in creating your content using our years of experience in marketing and management, and we will work tirelessly for your growth and popularity.

Make an appointment now

9. Consistently Create Fresh and Engaging Content

Consistent creation of fresh and engaging content will help you gain traction and keep your audience engaged with you. Post exciting pictures, videos, and other content regularly for your followers to enjoy.

At Fandafia, we understand that building a successful career as a creator can be challenging, especially when you’re doing it on your own. That’s why we give our members the tools they need to succeed, like content management, social media consulting, and account growth.

Collaborate with us via the “Apply now” button and see your % shoot up, as your earnings will.

We’ve made it our mission to help all our members grow their businesses by supporting you to achieve your goals and dreams faster. 

10. Produce High-Quality Content

A critical step to becoming a top 1% OnlyFans model is producing high-quality content. Consistently produce high-quality content that is unique and captivating. Ensure that the photos and videos uploaded are high quality and attractive to get people interested in hiring you. You should also include notes about what you’re offering or what kind of experience people can expect from engaging with you.

This will help you build your following and attract more quality subscribers. Invest in high-quality equipment like cameras and video equipment to produce mesmerizing content. Your marketing agency will help you create high-quality content relevant to your audience and assist with social media strategy. The more quality content you make, the more views, likes, and comments you will receive. 

Fandafia can help you with content strategy and help you with their experience and resources to make better content. 

11. Keep Improving Your Skills and Experiences

As a model, you must constantly practice and improve your skills over time. You can attend events like fashion shows, photoshoots, and other photo shoots. At Fandafia, we will help you build your portfolio while giving tips for reaching the top 1%. 

Make sure you’re constantly learning new things and improving your work so people will always want more from you! Ask for tips from established models and marketing experts, as well as looking at other successful models on the platform. This will also allow you to attract more followers, which will lead to more opportunities for your work.

12. Leverage Your Social Media Channels

Social media is essential to growing your audience as a top 1% OnlyFans model! You can start by sharing your portfolio on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and other social media platforms. Then, when you have a few thousand followers, start posting exciting videos and photos of yourself. You don’t have to post pictures of you in lingerie or swimsuits — just let your personality shine!

Leveraging social media is essential for any brand or business in our century. You can use your social handles on Twitter, Instagram, or Reddit, to promote your OnlyFans page to increase your followers. You can post adult content on Reddit to Twitter to drive traffic to your OnlyFans page. Use links on your bios to direct your social media followers to your OnlyFans. This way, you can get more followers, increase your engagements, and improve your earnings, working to become the top 1%.

13. Invest in Paid Shoutouts and Subreddits

Another way to become a top 1% OnlyFans sexy model is to invest in paid shoutouts by influencers. Find creative influencers to give you shoutouts for a fee. With innovative, aggressive, and focused marketing, you will grow your brand, increase visibility and subscribers, and improve your OnlyFans rankings. 

You can also use niche-focused subreddits on Reddit to promote your page. By doing subreddits and using influencers, you will let your potential clientele know they can get more if they subscribe to your page.

14. Appear on Podcasts and Promote your Channel

YouTube channels and podcasts like FreshnFit are a great way to engage with the market directly. Most podcasts allow guests to promote and mention their social media handles and channels. This is a great way to increase your reach the old-fashioned way. This will not only help increase exposure for your brand, but it will also help drive traffic back to your OnlyFans.

15. Do Your Research

You can research how other top models are succeeding. This will help you figure out what works for them and what doesn’t so that you can avoid those mistakes when the time comes for you to grow your brand.

The internet is an excellent tool for becoming a top model. Knowing what other people are doing is always helpful, and following along. You can also find out what other models say they did to succeed or fail in the industry.
